headline: Charter Revamps Network And Mobile Partnerships As Board Refresh Shapes Outlook
summary: Charter Communications is rolling out WiFi 7 Extenders and planning multi-gigabit speeds across its footprint by 2027. The company is expanding rural broadband with a substantial buildout expected to be completed in 2026. Charter has updated its mobile virtual network operator deals with Verizon and T-Mobile to support its growing mobile business. Wade Davis has been appointed to the Board of Directors, adding fresh input at the governance level. Charter Communications (NasdaqGS: CHTR) is...

headline: Why Verizon Stock Soared Today
summary: The telecom titan showed that subscriber gains and profitability are not mutually exclusive.
